dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 4299 IH: There are Two Sexes Act of 2023
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Ogles (for himself, Mr. Duncan, and Mr. Harris) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Oversight and Accountability

form.official-title: To prohibit the obligation or expenditure of Federal funds for certain forms that offer an option other than Male or Female to reference the sex of an individual, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the There are Two Sexes Act of 2023.

section.header: No obligation or expenditure of Federal funds for certain forms that offer an option other than Male or Female to reference the sex of an individual

subsection.text: No Federal funds may be obligated or expended for the creation or dissemination of a form required to be signed by an individual under a Federal law or regulation that offers an option other than Male or Female to reference the sex of the individual.
The prohibition under subsection (a) shall take effect on October 1, 2024.
